TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted but mean giant line backers from you school football team beat you up forbeing a nerd

i wish i was Superior to everyone in every way

Granted, but then the non-superior people build a robot that is superior to you.

I wish I had a copy of KSP V1.0

Granted, but it is actually Kwanza Super-Party

I wish that my cat could talk

Granted, but he talks so mutch your brain explodes.

I wish for you to make more STRANDED! Adventures.

Granted, but they are drawn in the infrared spectrum and you cant read them!

i wish i had a cow.

Granted, but it has mad cow disease.

I wish that the sky fell.

Granted, but it fell with the oxygen, and you die.

I wish for a fish.

Granted. Say hello to Jaws!

I wish MIR was still in orbit around earth.

Granted. Say hello to Jaws!

I wish MIR was still in orbit around earth.

Granted, but the station now has a super computer which controls all computers across the planets to enslave the human race.

I wish for the ability to Instant Transmission (teleport anywhere at anytime)

Granted, apart from it is broken and the only place you can teleport is the centre of the sun

I wish for pancakes to rain from the sky

Granted, but the pancakes taste terrible and cause you to hate pancakes for the rest of your life.

I wish that the second half of Breaking Bad Season 5 came out tomorrow.

Granted, but it is the worst TV series that you have ever seen.

I wish for my dog to stop scratching herself because she bleeds and has no hair on her. ;.;

Edited October 18, 2012 by lordpie

Granted but your dog has had an accident on your couch.

I wish I could play KSP on the highest settings and NOT lag.

Granted but your dog has had an accident on your couch.

I wish I could play KSP on the highest settings and NOT lag.

Granted, but the memory bug strikes and causes the game to crash every two launches. (Like me )

I wish I didn't have the memory bug so I could have all the mods I had back in .15.

(Me too )

Granted, but now there is no EVA, IVA, Or new planets.

I wish for humans to find the kerbol space station.

granted but it causes a kerbal human war that rages for millions of years

i wish people would stop making KSP wishes

Granted, but nobody can talk now, or even usher a wish.

I wish for the new season of DR who to begin.

Granted, but they completely changed the story and ruined it.

I wish for a delicious grilled salmon.

( HOW DARE YOU CORRUPT IT LIKE THAT, and, post more in the regular forums to get your post count up lol.)

Granted, but it eats you alive.

I wish for a.... KRAKEN!

Granted, but it quickly gets bored and swims off, as you don't have any space ships for it to play with.

I wish for extra hours in the day, so that I have time to play more KSP.

Granted, but the sun stays up for so long that too much radiation hits your country and everyone gets cancer.

I wish for a piano playing tortoise
Granted, but the tortoise died when you got it.

Granted, but the sun stays up for so long that too much radiation hits your country and everyone gets cancer.

I wish for a piano playing tortoise

Granted but everyone who hears his music goes deaf

i wish i had a rocket that could travel faster than lightspeed

I already answered....

Also, granted, but you ran out of fuel, so u can get back.

I wish for nothing.

Granted, now go back to page 47 and read lordpie's lecture until your brain explodes from confusion

I wish for an IPod that's battery life lasted more than 10 minutes (as myne doesÃ‚Â£
